spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches. The 2D plan has a defined foyer/entry zone at bottom-right leading into living/dining; the 3D render shows large exterior glazing/doors on the bottom edge and no recognizable foyer. Kitchen + utility zone (bottom-left in 2D) is not present as a distinct room in 3D. Decks/balconies (top side in 2D: one large near living/bed-2, one small near bed-1) are not represented in the correct locations; instead an exterior opening/balcony-like element appears on the bottom edge. Door and window placement does not match the 2D perimeter openings, and room proportions appear altered (living area shape/size and circulation paths differ).

structural_fidelity.notes: Some basic apartment envelope walls exist, but core architectural program is inconsistent with the plan. Adjacencies are wrong: in 2D the kitchen/utility adjoins living and sits near the common toilet; in 3D this block is missing/converted. The two toilets shown in 2D (C.TOI and TOI-1) are not faithfully recreated; the 3D top-left wet area appears mis-modeled (contains multiple WC fixtures and lacks the clear two-bath layout/placement). Decks are missing/relocated. Several openings appear placed without matching the 2D wall segments.

furniture_mapping.notes: Beds, sofa and dining set exist, but do not map cleanly to the 2D furniture layout (notably the living seating configuration and lack of kitchen cabinetry/appliances and utility fixtures). Furniture scale appears generally plausible, but the absence of kitchen/utility furniture is a major mismatch.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear and visually readable. Lighting is soft and consistent, geometry is mostly clean with minimal visible artifacts. However, some openings/doors look simplified and the model reads more like a generic 2-bed layout than a precise reconstruction.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen room (11' x 7'6") present in 2D plan is missing/not modeled as a distinct space in the 3D render.
Utility room (5' x 7'8") attached to kitchen in 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Foyer/entry space (4'6" x 3'8") and its circulation from main door are not represented correctly in the 3D render.
Decks/balconies (13'9" x 5' and 5'8" x 4'5") shown at the top side of the 2D plan are missing or not modeled in the correct locations in the 3D render.

Bathroom/toilet placement does not match: the 2D plan has two separate toilets (C.TOI and TOI-1) in specific locations, while the 3D render shows a mislocated/misconfigured wet area (appears to contain multiple WC fixtures and lacks the correct two-bath arrangement).
Main entrance door placement/orientation is incorrect: 2D plan entry is at bottom-right into a foyer; 3D emphasizes large bottom-edge exterior doors/openings instead.
Window/exterior opening placement is inconsistent with the 2D perimeter (notably large glazing/doors on the bottom edge not indicated as such in the 2D plan).

Room proportions/circulation are distorted: the living/dining footprint and connecting passages do not preserve the 2D plan geometry (angular/central space reshaped, relationships to adjacent rooms altered).
Hallucinated exterior opening/balcony-like element on the bottom edge of the 3D model that does not correspond to the 2D plan’s deck locations.
